plot: Composer/performer John Tesh and his orchestra perform his music inspired by Tesh's trip to Italy and by the site of the concert, the island of Santa Catalina, located off the coast of Southern California.
title: John Tesh: The Avalon Concert
plot_es: Composer/performer John Tesh and his orchestra perform his music inspired by Tesh's trip to Italy and by the site of the concert, the island of Santa Catalina, located off the coast of Southern California.
plot_en: Composer/performer John Tesh and his orchestra perform his music inspired by Tesh's trip to Italy and by the site of the concert, the island of Santa Catalina, located off the coast of Southern California.
